name: Defy
description: Push back or lash out against a higher power or authority.

name: Persuade
description: Convince someone to do something without misleading them.

name: Charge
description: Rush into danger without a plan.

name: Prowl
description: Skirt the edges of danger or lurk in the shadows.

name: Suggest
description: Plant an idea in someone's mind without them realizing it.

name: Survey
description: Watch vigilantly to notice details others might miss.
